question: 小声
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>small</kanji> <kanji>voice</kanji> is so small that you can hardly hear it. It's a <vocabulary>low voice</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>whisper</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The readings for this word are both kun'yomi readings. You've learned both of these readings by now so you should be able to read this on your own. Just watch out because, like in <ja>大声</ja>, the <ja>こえ</ja> becomes <ja>ごえ</ja> thanks to our old friend rendaku.
